Text:
function RYU_EP05_01()
    -- .序章-1【1月第1週】「念願の制服デート」

    -- 【指示説明】

    -- 　//BG：背景の指定
    -- 　//BU：バストアップの指定
    -- 　//SE：効果音の指定
    -- 　//CI：カットインの指定
    -- 　//effect：演出の希望
    -- 　◆：シーン切り替え
    -- 　￥：黒塗りハートの記号（主にエルメスが多用）

    -- 最終章「ボク姫様と紅蓮の契り」
    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
    SaveData.Title = "念願の制服デート"

SAVE()

    -- //BG：繁華街
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- 29	姫巫女・龍宮院ウラン	『ウラン』ルートに突入した
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(29)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav",0)

    MSG([[ About a week has passed since Uran Ryuguuin won the Princess Election against Daria Himegami. ]])

    MSG([[ Spending the first three days of the New Year at my family home, Uran-san invited me on our first date of the year. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ For some reason, with the condition that I wear my 'uniform.' ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0778.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Happy New Year, Erika-san." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1936.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "Happy New Year, Uran-san. Even though it’s still winter break, is it really okay to go on a date in uniform?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0779.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Yes, on the contrary, uniform is preferable. It has long been my dream to go on a date in uniform." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "A uniform date?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I wonder where she picked that up, but it’s such a charming dream. ]])

    MSG([[ But for Uran-san, who has quietly obeyed her family until now, it must be a heartfelt wish. ]])

    MSG([[ I find these moments, where my girlfriend shows parts of herself appropriate to her age, unbearably cute. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "If that’s your dream, I’m happy to make it come true. Come on, let’s go." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took Uran-san’s hand and started walking down the street. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected for the New Year, there’s an incredible crowd. More people than usual have gathered around G Station. ]])

    MSG([[ To avoid getting separated, I gently leaned closer to Uran-san’s shoulder. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1939.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "If we get separated even once, we might not find each other again. Please hold my hand tightly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0780.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】驚き
 "Y-Yes..." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san squeezed my hand back firmly. Her body temperature, slightly higher than others’, reached me, making my heart race. ]])

    MSG([[ Besides, her hand is so soft and comfortable. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1940.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 (N-No, no... I mustn’t think weird things.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Right now, Uran-san cherishes me as her same-sex partner. To feel romantic towards her now would be the lowest thing I could do. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0781.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Are you alright, Erika-san? Your body feels hotter than usual." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1941.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "R-Really? M-Maybe my body’s just not used to going on a date with someone as adorable as Uran-san... hahaha!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0782.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】苦笑
 "I’m nothing special." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1942.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "...Uran-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s face twisted slightly in sadness. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0783.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "I’m truly happy to be able to interact like friends with you, Erika-san, right now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0784.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "The others treat me as someone special, like a precious jewel kept in a jewelry box." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0785.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Meeting Lira-san and Erika-san, and being able to talk to you as friends, has truly made every day enjoyable." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0786.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "My dream was to play and enjoy school events equally with my friends." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0787.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】赤面
 "On the day of the Hakuyou Festival, when Erika-san walked around the stalls with me, it felt like one of my dreams had come true. Even now, I dream of that day." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0788.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】赤面
 "I had long worried about what would happen after graduation, but thanks to Erika-san, those regrets are gradually fading." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0789.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】赤面
 "Ah... I wish this time could last on and on..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1943.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Re-Regrets...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Noticing Uran-san’s distant, somewhat sorrowful gaze, I asked why. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san hesitated but began to speak. About the special circumstances she faces as a member of the Ryuguuin family. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_02")
end
